faq.title: Everything You Need to Know
faq.description: Got questions about TheSet? We've got answers. Learn how to make the most of your concert experience and join the community.

items.question: What is TheSet?
items.answer: TheSet is a real-time concert companion app that lets you track setlists, vote on songs, discover new artists, and connect with other music fans during live shows.

items.question: How does live voting work?
items.answer: During concerts, fans can vote on their favorite songs in real-time. Results are displayed instantly, creating a shared experience and showing which songs are resonating most with the crowd.

items.question: Can I track past concerts?
items.answer: Absolutely! Build your personal concert timeline by adding shows you've attended. You can view setlists, add photos, and relive your favorite concert memories.

items.question: Is TheSet free to use?
items.answer: Basic features including setlist viewing and artist discovery are free. Premium features like unlimited voting, exclusive content, and advanced analytics are available with a subscription.

items.question: How accurate are the setlists?
items.answer: Our setlists are crowd-sourced and verified by multiple attendees in real-time, making them highly accurate. The community helps ensure quality through voting and corrections.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Live Music Differently?
cta.description: Join millions of music fans who never miss a beat. Track shows, vote on setlists, and become part of the most passionate concert community. Your next great show is waiting.
